name: Giga Gear
description:
In Giga Gear you play as the Android Gearz. Deployed by B.R.A.I.N.

(B.attle  R.eady  A.ndroid  I.nitialization  N.etwork)

you are tasked with the destruction of Dead Lock, a Virus Network that wants to Lock all of Gear space away for it's own control. Stop Dead Lock's Machines and save Gear Space's Future!

Keyboard Controls : Move : Left and Right Arrow Keys
Jumping : Z Key
Shooting : X Key
Use Barrier Function : (with Core equipped) [HOLD] X Key
Ram enemies : (In the air, when close to enemy and Target Icon is showing)Press Z.
View Map of Level : M Key
Open / Close memory Bank  / Interact with various Objects : Enter Key

X Box 360 Controls : Move : Left and Right D-Pad

Jumping : X Button

Shooting : A Button

Use Barrier Function : (with Core equipped) [HOLD] A Button

Ram enemies : (In the air, when close to enemy and Target Icon is showing)Press X.

View Map of Level : Select Button

Open / Close memory Bank  Start

Interact with various Objects : B Button
